    • hideExtraTooltip

      ItemStack.Builder hideExtraTooltip()

      Hides all components which append tooltip lines using DataComponents.TOOLTIP_DISPLAY. The result should be an item with only name and lore.

    • set

      @Contract("_, _ -> this") <T> ItemStack.Builder set(Tag<T> tag, @Nullable T value)
